item.title: One Week in the Pacific Northwest
item.description: Photo by Zack Spear on UnSplash It’s no secret that the digital industry is booming. From exciting startups to global brands, companies are reaching out to digital agencies, responding to the new possibilities available. However, the industry is fast becoming overcrowded, heaving with agencies offering similar services — on the surface, at least.
